item.title: Matt add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Matt add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Matt add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "War must be, while we defend our lives against a destroyer who would devour all; but I do not love the bright sword for its sharpness, nor the arrow for its swiftness, nor the warrior for his glory. I love only that which they defend." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Matt add a quote by John August
item.description: "A little nonsense now and then, Is cherished by the wisest men." -- John August

item.title: Matt add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "We all have our moments of brilliance and glory, and this was mine." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Matt add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "So, please, oh please, we beg, we pray, go throw your TV set away, and in its place you can install, a lovely bookcase on the wall." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Matt add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Do you know what breakfast cereal is made of? It's made of all those little curly wooden shavings you find in pencil sharpeners!" -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Matt add a quote by C. S. Lewis
item.description: "He's not safe, but he's good (referring to Aslan, the Lion, in The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe)" -- C. S. Lewis

item.title: Matt add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "I love you like a fat kid loves cake!" -- Scott Adams

item.title: Matt add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "I think that if I ever have kids, and they are upset, I won't tell them that people are starving in China or anything like that because it wouldn't change the fact that they were upset. And even if somebody else has it much worse, that doesn't really change the fact that you have what you have." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Matt add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "What a kid I got, I told him about the birds and the bees and he told me about the butcher and my wife." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: Matt add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "I am fond of pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as equals." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Matt add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Matt add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Matt add a quote by Yogi Berra
item.description: "Always go to other people's funerals, otherwise they won't come to yours." -- Yogi Berra

item.title: Matt add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "If a book about failures doesn't sell, is it a success?" -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Matt add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Cats are intended to teach us that not everything in nature has a purpose." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Matt add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Matt add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Matt add a quote by Mark Hoppus
item.description: "the past is only the future with the lights on." -- Mark Hoppus

item.title: Matt add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Jazz isn't dead. It just smells funny." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Matt add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "None but ourselves can free our minds." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Matt add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "And I'll stand on the ocean until I start sinking." -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Matt add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Matt add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "I came from a real tough neighborhood. Once a guy pulled a knife on me. I knew he wasn't a professional, the knife had butter on it." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: Matt add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Give a man a fire and he's warm for a day, but set fire to him and he's warm for the rest of his life." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Matt add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I sent the club a wire stating, PLEASE ACCEPT MY RESIGNATION. I DON'T WANT TO BELONG TO ANY CLUB THAT WILL ACCEPT ME AS A MEMBER." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Matt add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "I came from a real tough neighborhood. Why, every time I shut the window I hurt somebody's fingers." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: Matt add a quote by Don Marquis
item.description: "Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday" -- Don Marquis

item.title: Matt add a quote by Fernando Pessoa
item.description: "No intelligent idea can gain general acceptance unless some stupidity is mixed in with it" -- Fernando Pessoa
